objects.text:
• Iconic Canvas Design
• Durable Rubber Sole
• Cushioned Insole
• Versatile Style

product_details.name: Classic Red Canvas Sneakers - Timeless Style & Ultimate Comfort
product_details.description:
• Iconic red canvas upper construction for lasting durability
• Classic white rubber toe cap and bumper for added protection
• Durable white rubber outsole with signature diamond tread pattern
• Traditional white lace-up closure for adjustable fit
• Contrast white stitching details for classic aesthetic
• Cushioned insole for all-day comfort
• Breathable canvas material ideal for casual wear
• Versatile design suitable for any casual outfit
• Available in unisex sizing
• Timeless low-top silhouette perfect for everyday wear

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and stylish layout that highlights a product — a pair of red sneakers — in an eye-catching asymmetrical composition. The background is split diagonally with a deep navy blue (#1A2B4A) occupying the top-left triangle and a clean light grey (#F2F2F2) diagonally across the bottom-right. Diagonal red accent lines add a sense of motion and energy. Text layer `heading_1` and `heading_2` introduce the product name in large uppercase white typography. The tagline `tagline` in bold red adds emphasis. A bullet list under `description` details product features. The `price` and a strong red `cta_background` with "SHOP NOW" call-to-action in `cta` complete the hierarchy. The product image `product_image` is diagonally tilted for a dynamic look.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A2B4A
- Scarlet Red: #E74C3C
- Light Grey: #F2F2F2
- White: #FFFFFF
- Shadow Grey Gradient: #E6E6E6
product_color: The product image features vibrant red canvas sneakers with white rubber soles and laces, contrasted with fine black detailing. Red (#D72323) takes center stage, radiating energy and boldness—ideal for drawing attention in an ad banner. White (#FFFFFF) adds cleanliness and simplicity, balancing the bright red and giving a sense of style and purity. The subtle touch of black (#1C1C1C) acts as an outline to create visual definition and structure. These colors are harmoniously blended—the white laces stroke across the red canvas, highlighted by even lighting, creating a sharp, fresh contrast that feels dynamic and youthful. Perfect for targeting energetic, fashion-forward audiences.
